Key Match Events: Kuldeep Yadav took 3 wickets for 19 runs
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 13 runs
Rishabh Pant hit five boundaries in eight balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's total of 196 was built by a series of quickfire cameos in defiance of a slow pitch
Bangladesh's Tanzim Hasan was their best bowler with figures of 2-32
Rishad Hossain took two wickets and bowled one of the death overs
Kuldeep Yadav derailed the Bangladesh chase with three wickets
Jasprit Bumrah bowled 15 dot balls out of his 24 deliveries
